subject_information.address: 49331 Lewis Views Apt. 516, Lake Maryshire, DE 59549

suspicious_activity.narrative: From February to July 2025, Jacqueline Rodriguez (ID: CUST_0111) conducted frequent large transactions. On July 29, 2025, a large incoming wire transfer of $76,517.25 was noted. This was followed by multiple outgoing wire transfers just below $10,000 on July 30 and 31, 2025. This activity appears structured to evade reporting requirements, suggesting potential money laundering.
key_indicators: Multiple outgoing wire transfers just below $10,000
suspicious_activity.ai_reasoning: The customer has a high risk rating and is involved in large and frequent transactions. There is a sudden spike in activity with a large incoming wire transfer of $76,517.25 followed by multiple large outgoing wire transfers just below $10,000, which could indicate an attempt to avoid detection (structuring).
